name: The Guinness Disc of Records: Second Edition
overview: The follow up to the groundbreaking early CDTV title, this updates the records and improves on the technical techniques from the original release. As with the first, records can be browsed by selecting one of the 11 main topics, examples of which are The Human Being, Science & Technology or Arts & Entertainment, but they can also be found through a search menu or an alphabetically arranged index.
